channel.title: Open-Source on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Open-Source on CloudNativePG - PostgreSQL Operator for Kubernetes

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Jonathan Gonzalez
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. Today we meet Jonathan Gonzalez, Senior Kubernetes Developer at EDB and CloudNativePG maintainer.

item.title: Contributor Spotlight: Itay Grudev
item.description: In a mini-series on this blog we highlight the work of the community. First up is Itay Grudev, component owner for the Operator chart and PostgreSQL Cluster Chart and the Grafana Dashboard for CloudNativePG.
